mapper.select: SELECT driverid, waybillno, unloadtime, price, weight FROM wuliu_bill WHERE confirm_Price_A = '1' AND confirm_Price_B = '1' AND waybillno IN('YD1712070240','YD1712070233','YD1712070239','YD1712070234')
SELECT driverid driverid, billno AS waybillno, signtime unloadtime, yf price, 1 weight FROM anlian_bill WHERE confirm_Price_A = '1' AND confirm_Price_B = '1'
SELECT id payid, payee_bank_card_id bankid FROM pay_invoice_1 WHERE pay_status IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT id payid, payee_bank_card_id bankid FROM pay_invoice_1 WHERE pay_status IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT id payid, payee_bank_card_id bankid FROM pay_invoice_1 WHERE pay_status IN (2)
SELECT id payid, payee_bank_card_id bankid FROM pay_invoice_1 WHERE pay_status IN (3)
